New Records: Anrich Nortje produced a career-best performance in T20Is with 4/7 from 4 overs
Key Match Events: Ottneil Baartman took a wicket with his first ball
Nortje and Baartman ripped Sri Lanka apart
Keshav Maharaj made two quick breakthroughs in an over
Wanindu Hasaranga removed De Kock and Tristan Stubbs with a double strike
Post-Match Reflections: Anrich Nortje won the Player of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the first-ever T20 World Cup match in New York
The surface offered plenty for quicks and spinners alike
Others: South Africa beat Sri Lanka as impressive bowling display lights up New York
South Africa bowled Sri Lanka out for their lowest total in men's T20Is
